io::ByteArrayInputStream Class Reference
[Input/output library]

#include <ByteArrayInputStream.h>

Inheritance diagram for io::ByteArrayInputStream:

[legend]
List of all members.

Detailed Description

ByteArrayInputStream reads bytes from a memory buffer.


Public Member Functions

int available () const
 Returns the number of bytes that can be read from the stream without blocking.
 ByteArrayInputStream (const void *data, int size)
 Creates an input stream from specified memory buffer.
int read (void *data, int size)
 Tries to read specified number of bytes from the stream.
void reset (const void *data, int size)
 Resets with new input buffer.
lang::String toString () const
 Returns byte array identifier.

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

io::ByteArrayInputStream::ByteArrayInputStream (  const void *  data,
int  size
) 
 

Creates an input stream from specified memory buffer.

Note that the contents of the buffer is duplicated so the buffer can be freed immediately after ByteArrayInputStream constructor returns.

Member Function Documentation

int io::ByteArrayInputStream::available (   )  const [virtual]
 

Returns the number of bytes that can be read from the stream without blocking.

Implements io::InputStream.

int io::ByteArrayInputStream::read (  void *  data,
int  size
)  [virtual]
 

Tries to read specified number of bytes from the stream.

Doesn't block the caller if specified number of bytes isn't available.

Returns:
Number of bytes actually read.

Implements io::InputStream.

void io::ByteArrayInputStream::reset (  const void *  data,
int  size
) 
 

Resets with new input buffer.

Note that the contents of the buffer is duplicated so the buffer can be freed immediately after ByteArrayInputStream constructor returns.
